attributes.action: change the way fishing rod licences work in the UK so that one licence will enable the holder to use as many rods as the holder wishes, dependant on fishery rules, the same way as a TV licence works with TVs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as many of you know, if you want to use more than two rods you are required to buy two rod licences. I propose a change to this lince policy that old enable the holder of one licence o use as many rods as the holders requires, whilst respecting the rules of the fishery. I would also suggest that the cost of the licence to anglers should remain at te current rate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
